Digital Marketing

Leverage digital channels to reach your audience.

Strategy

A solid brand and business strategy is the starting point of any marketing venture. The digital marketing strategy we devise is ever in sync with the brand story your business want to tell and your overall business and brand-building objectives. Whether customer acquisition or retention through brand awareness campaigns.Your business offerings is presented to your prospective consumers in a way that encourages brand loyalty.

We talk with you to find out what challenges your brand is facing, then we brainstorm to come up with the best and the most cost-effective solution for you. A wide variety of tools and tactics are employed to achieve this.

The variety of tools and tactics offered by the digital medium.

Search Engine Optimization

SEO plays a vital role in customer retention and acquisition, as it ensures your business's offering will appear in the search results, allowing you to reach potential customers.

Search Advertising

Also known as pay-per-click which is keyword based. The ad will come up in response to the search terms entered by the consumer, which improves sales and customer acquisition.

Social Media

Social media is useful for brand building, raising awareness of the brand story and allowing the consumer to become involved in the story through collaboration. The platforms also play a role in building awareness, due to their shareable, viral nature.

Affiliate Marketing

Online affiliate marketing helps to promote eCommerce websites, with the referrers being rewarded for every visitor, subscriber or customer provided through their efforts. It is a useful tactic for brand building and acquisition..

Video Marketing

video marketing is excellent for capturing and retaining customer attention. It provides tangible value in the form of information, entertainment or inspiration and boosts a brandâ€™s image in the eyes of potential customers.

Email Marketing

Email marketing is a tool for building relationships with potential and existing customers through valuable content and promotional messages.

How it works

We have models in approaching digital marketing that are most effective in getting results for our clients.

The optimal marketing tools and tactics we employ help us see the bigger picture.

  • THINK

    Think phase is tasked with developing strategic plans for the digital channels. Consumer insights, research, concept development, budget allocation and channel planning are executed.

  • CREATE

    Create phase bring concepts to life by executing campaigns and sharing digital platforms. It covers all aspects of creating web assets, from web design and development to conceptual copywriting, the creation of social media assets, mobile development, engineering business systems and social media integration.

  • ENGAGE

    Engage is responsible for driving traffic and building relationships. Media buying and planning, search engine optimisation, email marketing, social media and campaign management are some of the key activities here.

  • OPTIMISE

    Optimization helps to track and analyse as a way to understand how assets and campaigns are performing. It delivers insight and lessons through analytics, data mining, conversion optimisation and testing. It is carried out at every phase.
